Uses of Package
ml.alternet.security.auth

  • Packages that use ml.alternet.security.auth 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.security.auth  
    ml.alternet.security.auth.crypt
    Allow to breakdown a crypt in several parts (hash, salt, workfactor...)
    ml.alternet.security.auth.formats
    Common built-in crypt formats used to retrieve concrete hashers.
    ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters
    Common built-in crypt formatters used to breakdown a crypt in its parts or format parts of a crypt in its string representation.
    ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher
    Concrete hashers.
  • Classes in ml.alternet.security.auth used by ml.alternet.security.auth 
    Class and Description
    CredentialsChecker
    Allow to check credentials regarding a list of candidates crypt formats.
    CryptFormat
    Giving a crypt, allow to detect the right hasher suitable for checking a password validity.
    CryptFormatter
    Bridge between the string representation of a crypt and its parts.
    Hasher
    Computes/checks a password to/with a crypt.
    Hasher.Builder
    Hasher builder.
    Hasher.Builder.Field
    The standard property names
    Hasher.Configuration
    Read-only configuration of a hasher.
  • Classes in ml.alternet.security.auth used by ml.alternet.security.auth.crypt 
    Class and Description
    Hasher
    Computes/checks a password to/with a crypt.
  • Classes in ml.alternet.security.auth used by ml.alternet.security.auth.formats 
    Class and Description
    CryptFormat
    Giving a crypt, allow to detect the right hasher suitable for checking a password validity.
    Hasher
    Computes/checks a password to/with a crypt.
    Hasher.Builder
    Hasher builder.
  • Classes in ml.alternet.security.auth used by ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters 
    Class and Description
    CryptFormat
    Giving a crypt, allow to detect the right hasher suitable for checking a password validity.
    CryptFormatter
    Bridge between the string representation of a crypt and its parts.
    Hasher
    Computes/checks a password to/with a crypt.
  • Classes in ml.alternet.security.auth used by ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher 
    Class and Description
    Hasher
    Computes/checks a password to/with a crypt.
    Hasher.Builder
    Hasher builder.
    Hasher.Configuration
    Read-only configuration of a hasher.
    Hasher.Configuration.Extension
    A hasher can extend this configuration extension when a crypt can be used for configuration, typically by using it as a template in order to extract a parameter such as the workfactor.
